trends: There have been no other sightings in Sacaton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in a remote area of the San Tan Mountains. Not one single sighting butseveral over a 3 year period. No moon during sightings. No electrical service inthe area, so no light interference. At the time I spent almost every eveningoutside enjoying the stars and the quiet. From within the mountains I observed ahelicopter, sometimes 2 that followed this object closely. It was completelydark with no lights. A strange sound. I am familiar with aircraft and turbineengines. This was very quiet and had a strange sound. I assumed that it was anew experimental aircraft from a facility within the San Tans. Sometimes thesecraft headed to Sacaton. There is a very strange facility near Sacatonsurrounded by orchards on the Reservation. It appeared that these aircraftheaded toward Sacaton. After finding this facility I became intriqued.This is avery odd facility. I can show anyone the location if anyone interested. I am notclaiming that it is alien, but the facility and these sightings are interestingand may worthwhile.
Summary: Craft at night w/ helicopter escort. Facility on I
